events.comment:
Zombie pathfinding : Under a certain distance from the player, Zombie goes to the player
It isn't applied if Zombie is stunned.
Zombie animation #1 : When Zombie moves, pick the right animation
Zombie animation #1.2 : Update the last registered coordinates to use in the next loop
Zombie animation #2 : When Zombie doesn't move, set animation to showing his back
InfoHP field update : Updates the HP field at the top left of the screen
Zombie attack : Player loses HP when colliding with a Zombie, the Zombie is stunned, and Player gets invulnerable
